Detailed Description

Create and provide an interface to the index table for the model (query) sitemap

bool ModelSitemap::get_bucket_iters ( const uint  c,
const my_float_t  perimeter,
const my_float_t  max_len,
const my_float_t  min_len,
bucket_vci *  bucket_begin,
bucket_vci *  bucket_end 
) [virtual]

Given c,p,l,s get the iterators for the corresponding bucket.

Given the indexes into the index table, set the pointers to the begin and end of the bucket.

Parameters:
c hash_class index
p perimeter level index
l longest edge length index
s shortest edge length index
bucket_begin Pointer to the beginning of the bucket
bucket_end Pointer to the end of the bucket
Returns:
true if bucket is nonempty
